description: Update an existing material site inventory location.
permissions: Allowed for admins, broker members of the material site's broker, or manager members of the material site's material supplier.
side_effects: Updates a material site inventory location record.
validation_notes: The <id> argument is required. At least one updatable field must be provided. Latitude and longitude must be provided together and are validated as coordinates. If --unit-of-measure is provided, it cannot be blank. qualified-name and material-site are create-only and cannot be updated.

flags.name: unit-of-measure
flags.validation: If provided, value cannot be blank.
